abstract: Rick Perry's opponents in the Republican field appear not to be following suit in his plans to skip some debates.
snippet: Rick Perry's opponents in the Republican field appear not to be following suit in his plans to skip some debates.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas may be reserving the option of not participating in future debates. But his opponents in the Republican field appear not to be following suit. After all, the debates are good, low-cost exposure, particularly for candidates who are not at the top of the polls.

headline.main: The Other Campaigns Chime In on Perry and Debates
